website_summaries.verdict: Nice display screen quality and size. Only one camera included in this package.
pros: Infrared night vision feature works nicely
Offers ability to view signal on smartphone app
cons: No tilt or pan remote control of camera
Signal reliability is intermittent over 2.4 GHz band

customer_reviews.title: Wakes me up when I don't want it to
customer_reviews.text: The parent unit beeps, loudly, for connection disruptions, even when the screen is turned off (but not powered off). This has woken me and my husband during the middle of the night on several occasions. It's one thing for the baby to wake me up, it's another for a piece of technology to wake me up just to let me know it doesn't have connection for a function I'm not even currently using due to being asleep. Worse, the shrill beeping has even woken the baby in her room across the hall during one of her naps. I contacted customer service and was informed there is no way to turn off or even decrease the volume on this beeping function.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin

customer_reviews.title: Somethings are not clear by the time of the purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Somethings are not clear by the time of the purchase: 1. The camera don’t move. It’s a static camera and once you put it you will not be able to move it from the monitor. 2. The Hubble app works but it charges you USD29.99/year for the basic plan. So to see your baby on your smartphone and out of your home it’s not for free!
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this camera. Purchased in March 2018, but by Feb 2019 the charging port for the screen stopped working normally. Besides the short lifespan, the range is not that wonderful. I have to place it on a specific spot on my nightstand , otherwise it loses connection and beeps like crazy. My Infant Optics camera has no problem reaching every area of my home- even outside. This camera has trouble through minor wall obstructions and will not even reach into my garage.
customer_reviews.author: M.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Camera continually drops off line
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Camera continually drops off line, unable to access camera is the usual error message or won't show a picture but outputs sounds. Vey unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Grainy picture. Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this is a little grainy and definitely has a delay. Over all it has easy functionality. I love that it has a temperature display. If you're looking for a monitor where you can split the screen for multiple children you can do this with you to 4 cameras! I have not needed to use the night vision or phone app yet so once I use them I will update my review. I decided to return this item. The picture really is too grainy, for the cost it should be clearer. There is also quite a delay in transmission and it would lose signal when only about 15 feet away
customer_reviews.author: Jenna K.

customer_reviews.title: Has a glitch that can be bypassed, access to video is practical and fun for family
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of THE MOST helpful products. We have the camera set up on our baby’s crib, and I can take the monitor with me anywhere in the house and still see the baby. We have a big house, so the range is big for the signal. Oue family members can all access the video through the motorola app, so it’s been a beautiful experience knowing that they have seen him grow. The video does freeze sometimes, and we figured out that if we play the music on the device, we can bypass that error. It just requires constant monitoring (as you should with a baby anyway!) to ensure that the video didn’t freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Mena

customer_reviews.title: Lost connection; won’t pair.
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked well at first, and then one day became disconnected from the base. We tried everything to reconnect the camera - following the online user manual, watching YouTube videos, reading through other user reviews - and were not able to connect the camera. I consider myself a technically savvy person, and was dumbfounded by how difficult this process was and how un-intuitive the actual interface design was. Also to note, in the background of this whole process, the base played an irritating beep. You can’t silence it. With a crying baby in my other arm, this simply created unnecessary stress. I am beyond frustrated with this product and am finding another brand.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these. For the most part, this is a fairly good monitor. the connection to the Hubble app isn't great. A lot of times it doesn't work. The range for this is great! Definitely works inbetween floors. The picture is nice and clear. You can turn off the sleep mode or else make it 5, 30, or 60 minutes. It stays on when it is plugged in. Plenty loud. Picks up the kids voice well, but not outside noises (sound machine). All in all, I'd buy it again (obviously because I bought one for the new baby). Highly recommend getting the spider mount though.
customer_reviews.author: MrsGar

customer_reviews.title: I live in a tiny 700 square foot apartment, ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a tiny 700 square foot apartment, but the monitor won't stay connected to the camera. The thing can't go past the kitchen without it going out. We dealt with this, but after 5 months it started not working on a regular basis halfway through nap/bedtime. Finally the night vision went. Now the thing will only work during the day within 200 feet of where the baby is sleeping. Don't buy it as you will need to buy another camera within a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Polcyn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying! Night time picture which is what its essentially used for has HORRIBLE pic quality!!! I can’t even see the baby! Every time I turn it on it has to find the camera which takes 5-10 minutes. I wish I could return but my husband threw the box out. This is such a disappointment for all the money I spent! I love Motorola which is why I specifically bought this brand and spent the money but it’s the worst!!!!! Lastly even with volume all the way up I can still barely hear the baby when she cries. DO NOT BUY HAS HORRIBLE PICTURE QUALITY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan611

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg let me just say we ha e had probably 10-20 different monitors and I am so so sick to death of trying them. Finally we tried this one and thank god we did. This one DOES connect to WiFi and you CAN use hubble and it DOES stay connected and we have 4 cameras connected now and it still works perfect. I truly don't understand why the newer and double price models even exist when they are a pile of trash and can't do (even though the box says they can) have of what this set can do. I so highly recommend it to any parent. Love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Pro’s: picture quality, size, night vision, being able to see your child while on vacation via the app., and the battery life is much better on this one than the 3.5” monitor. Con’s: the sound quality is absolutely horrible. Even after turning the volume to the max you can still barely hear anything. You only get volume if your child is screaming crying. I have wondered if something is actually wrong with my unit. Also, if your child is in a swing (in motion) you can not see them very well. The stream lags too much to see a child in motion.
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I would strongly advise to NOT get this monitor. The image is grainy. You can’t even put the camera directly above the crib because it’s too zoomed in. It beeps SO LOUDLY when the battery is dying (WHYYYY). It glitches out and the picture goes black for no reason when the WiFi is working perfectly fine. And how is it that Motorola, a huge international manufacturer, couldn’t even think to put a CLOCK on this monitor?? Baffling. Don’t waste your money. Way too overpriced for mediocre results. Wish we could return it to get our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Breeze Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is excellent for the price and I like that you can connect it to an app on your phone to see your baby from anywhere. However I made the mistake of keeping the screen part plugged in all the time and now the battery won’t work unplugged for more than a couple minutes. I only paid $80 for mine but much more and I’d just spring for a better monitor. I wish the picture was sound or motion activated but you can either have it on all the time or off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I was so nervous to order this but tried it anyway. IT IS AMAZING! The picture quality and battery life are better than any other monitor I’ve looked at. Not to mention you can download the free app and check the camera when you’re not home. I had a summer infant monitor previously and it would die so fast and the second camera was $$$ .. I highly recommend this monitor. We have never dropped service or lost connection as some of the reviews stated, we always have 5 bars and we have a 1900 sq ft house and the kids rooms are the furthest from the camera. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed considering the price of this item
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed considering the price of this item. The picture is ok, day and night. But it has very little range and as soon as there is a wall in between, it is out of range and starts beeping. I can't even take it outside. My 30 dollars monitor works perfectly around the house, in and out. Performance should be a lot better for the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Night vision does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: After waiting a week to receive the wall mounts that I had to purchase separately, I finally Got them screwed into the wall and set up- my kid goes to bed and Night vision doesn’t work at all and I can’t see my child at all.. I have a very small Night light in the room and thought that might be the problem But it is not. I should have listened to all the negative reviews for this.. my advice - sort Amazon by average review and buy the top one because this one’s night vision is useless making the monitor useless :(
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the dark but bright light washes out the video
customer_reviews.text: This camera and monitor work great at night vision and as long as the sun in not shining brightly in the room. The video becomes so washed out by the light it is basically useless. I bought this mainly to keep and eye on my pet when not in the same room. I was even hoping to be able to see him outside through the window, but bright sunshine makes this camera useless. guess it would be good for a baby monitor where the room is fairly dark.
customer_reviews.author: Beastwhite

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We had a more expensive Motorola model for the first 18 months of my son’s life. We had problems with it from the get go. I was so tired of it and found this one on sale and it has been GREAT! I’ve had no connection issue, the hubble app was recently updated and is so much better! The screen is very clear, even though it’s smaller than our old one. I guess simple is better! I’m giving it 4 stars only because the sound indicator lights pick up my son’s white noise machine and are constantly lighting up even when he is not crying.
customer_reviews.author: lana

customer_reviews.title: Good features. Bad range.
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are terrible. Lost connection across our home. App was functional and allowed for movement alerts but it was buggy and was constantly sending them. Samsung Wisenet Baby View system is much more reliable albeit the app is less functional.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Poole

customer_reviews.title: Such a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This video monitor is a piece of junk especially for what we paid for it. The monitor is dark half the time and the sound doesn't work at all so it's basically useless since I can't see or hear my twins. I shouldn't have to pair it on a daily basis to get it to work. And when the display actually does work I still can't hear any sound so we have to have an audio monitor in addition to the video monitor. Absolutely ridiculous and Motorola customer service is useless. I would never recommend any of their products to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: christopher bengry

customer_reviews.title: Returned 2 of these!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this camera. The Hubble app is really easy to use, but the we had problems with the camera and monitor with one, returned it, got another one, but it wouldn’t connect to our internet or the monitor. Overall very dissatisfied. Returned both cameras we received. The more expensive Motorola camera should be delivered today ($180). Hopefully that one works better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality-do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this monitor. The camera out of nowhere stopped working DAYS before my warranty expired. How convenient. Luckily I got a case started in time. They replaced the camera but not the monitor which now I’ll not charge. You have to finagle the charger just right, propped up on something, every night just to get it to hopefully charge a bit so it won’t beep obnoxiously waking everyone up when it dies. Terrible quality for the price. Do NOT purchase this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks, internet interference
customer_reviews.text: I have not been impressed with his monitor for the price. My son is 8 months old and I need to replace the batteries already. Also the app is atrocious. It is so slow and the sound only works every once and a while. The connection isn’t great when we try to stream movies while the monitors screen is on. Update - 14 months and the power connection goes in and out. If I move the monitor whole it is not plugged in it shuts off no matter how much power the battery has.
customer_reviews.author: erien

customer_reviews.title: Camera broke after 10 days of use
customer_reviews.text: The night vision on the camera went out at under 2 weeks of use! So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: kayley

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second monitor of its model that I have bought. My first unit stopped charging even when plugged in all the time. I enjoy many of the features which is why I purchased again. This time around I am not so happy. The volume is very quiet on the parent monitor. If I use the Hubble app, the sound is much clearer but not ideal for long usage. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could get a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it no stars. Night vision doesn’t work, one of my cameras won’t connect to the parent monitor, the charger won’t even stay in the charging port and it’s not from being handled too roughly... the monitor stays on my bedside table. This is a complete piece of junk and we’ve only been having it for 7 months. The last 4 months it hasn’t worked.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Just the mobile function that is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Just the mobile function that is a bit rough. The app is not stable. The delay time is big and also it glitches a lot. But overall an amazing monitor!!
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Pires

customer_reviews.title: Horrible range!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible connection. Only got 2 stars because image is decent. However as many reviewers stated, the parent unit looses signal with the camera even from one room away. And beeps like crazy when this happen. There is no way to disable the beep sound.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: has great features but the camera is always getting disconnected it ...
customer_reviews.text: Over priced, has great features but the camera is always getting disconnected its annoying In the middle of the night! ....works okay other wise , my older Motorola worked way better..... update one year later waste of money I would never suggest this monitor to anyone never connects to WiFi or the monitor it’s self.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I Love that it connects to my phone and to hand held device! Great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica aldridge

customer_reviews.title: I had a Motorola monitor originally and was very happy, after 5 years I needed another and went ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Motorola monitor originally and was very happy, after 5 years I needed another and went with this one. It's horrible! The range is awful and it constantly beeps when it looses it's signal, we cannot get it to connect to our phones, the picture will randomly become fuzzy or very gray. I would not buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture quality and the zoom feature. Also the walkie talkie feature . The battery life could be better, we find that after about an hour it's ready to die even if it started with a full battery. Update: after 1.5 years it has completely died. Won't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Cas N.

customer_reviews.title: DROPS SIGNAL ALL THE TIME
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. This thing drops signal all the time. Usually always when im laying down for bed or already asleep. When i need it the most of all. The beeping doesnt stop unless you turn it off or hit the power button. I have been on the hunt for a new baby monitor because we cant use this half the time. its unreliable. Its too late past the return window or I would return it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnzi

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we purchased in 2 years. We only bought a new one because the old one would not hold a charge. The picture quality is by far the best, love the temperature display and the sound quality is great! Love this product and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S.

customer_reviews.title: the device would not connect to the internet even when the camera was only 30 feet away from a super fast wifi router
customer_reviews.text: The monitor function of this device worked very well. However, the device would not connect to the internet even when the camera was only 30 feet away from a super fast wifi router.
customer_reviews.author: october

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended to watch over your precious Little One!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality product. Purchased the camera 2 months ago and use it on a daily basis, no regrets, no connection issues and good quality audio and visual. We use the Hubble app regularly and can talk or check on her from outside the home or any part of the Globe. Highly recommended and reliable product... just wish I had purchased 2 cameras....
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on the app!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason we bought this monitor was for the function that allowed for phone connection and in the 2 months since we bought it we have not been able to get it to work once. Always give an error at some point in the setup. The battery life on the portable screen in also very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Olmo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to connect to my WiFi or my phone. Wish I had not purchased this
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable monitor
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset with this monitor. We had another one but needed one with a split screen for another baby on the way. The last week, our monitor has been losing it's signal and the other morning it cut off in the morning when our little girl woke up and we didn't hear her. I'm going to be contacting the company because this is way too much money to Spend to have an unreliable monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Stay away of this
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Picture quality is really bad. Easy to pair with monitor and phone but even with the 300mb of internet speed i have in my house the image of the app is really really bad and disconnect every other minute. Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer Martin

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: picture quality is good. sound quality not as great unless you are right up on the monitor. my toddler would wake up and I would never know. Will return it and keep the monitor that alarms when he moves out of range. Although the dual monitor piece was a nice feature especially having two little ones in different rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Piece of Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. This will break on you and when it does Motorola will tell you it will take two weeks to get a replacement part. Look elsewhere for a more reputable brand. Motorola can't be trusted anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good monitor. App sucks but don’t really use it. Only complaint would be the battery life. If you’re using the video it doesn’t last very long maybe 30-45 minutes. I mostly use it for just the sound but check the video to make sure everything is okay. I Keep it plugged in at night so the battery doesn’t matter. The video quality when it’s pitch black in the room is great, I can see everything. Been using it for a few months and no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: The battery life on the parent unit dies after a half an hour.
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with this baby monitor except that the battery life on the parent unit dies after about a half hour of being off the charger. So in order for me to use the parent unit, I have to keep it plugged in to a charger. The picture is fine, I've had no issues connection wise. It's just a huge annoyance to have to keep the unit hooked up and charging to see the monitor feed. I really wouldn't recommend it, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: ML84

customer_reviews.title: Charging + power cord are sub-par
customer_reviews.text: We started using this baby monitor 5 months ago when our son started sleeping in his own room. The battery lasts about 45 minutes without being plugged in. Now the connection between the power cord and the monitor unit is failing, so we have to jury rig it to get it to charge. For the price, I would imagine that this would last longer than 5 months! What a piece!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Works great but doesn’t last much past a year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera 13 months ago and now all of a sudden it won’t accept a charge so it is unusable. It worked great since we bought it however the night vision quality was never good and the daytime image wasn’t much to brag about either. Very disappointed that this product is only 13 months old and we are no longer allowed to use it. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied with Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it since February and it is already having issues. The screen seems to have a line thought it making the color distorted and picture hard to see. The battery life isnt great and the distance is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Tklatt

customer_reviews.title: This is just hard for me to see
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to work good does not lose connection .but the monitor the picture is really hard to make when you're looking at the monitor but other than that night vision is good Just can't always make the picture out
customer_reviews.author: Were should I put it

customer_reviews.title: Signal Cuts out all the time
customer_reviews.text: Camera signal cuts out constantly, Even with the receiving unit in the next room. Alarm goes off middle of night all the time saying it lost camera signal. App for viewing on phone is terrible, its mostly ads. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morse

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, despite reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Despite bad reviews I'm super happy with this monitor and the related app. It was delivered to my home a half hr ago and it's already installed on my phone and I can see my baby sleeping both on the monitor and the phone. I'm not really much of a reviewer personally , but I took a risk on this due to the rating and am more than happy, so I had to say something. I had a summer monitor before , same price but not all the bells and whistles. I live in Minnesota so I'm happy about the temp reader as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lou

customer_reviews.title: the best one buy it
customer_reviews.text: this is the best camera for my baby girl i recommend for all who like it buy it is the best love it
customer_reviews.author: suella

customer_reviews.title: Will have to keep replacing monitor
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and spend a little extra for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Main

customer_reviews.title: Looking like a demonstration (unboxed) product.
customer_reviews.text: Box was not perfect but fixed with some adhesive. Vendor and not maker fault. I didn’t turn it on yet so I cannot say at this point if everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio F. A. Barros

customer_reviews.title: Quality products with a bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair and superb video and audio quality. Battery life is really bad . Now we need to leave the Mobin plugged in all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lokitha Amarasena

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t charge at all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now purchased two of these. The first one I thought was just a fluke, but now the second has the same problem. I literally keep these monitors on their chargers all night/day. Whenever I do have to take them off the charger, the battery dies within an hour. WHY?!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: The range on the held held device is pretty bad. It does work on wifi with my ...
customer_reviews.text: The range on the held held device is pretty bad. It does work on wifi with my phone pretty well though. I have an iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work from my kids room to my kitchen. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our daughter for our grandson. They hooked it up so quickly and easily. They told us it has so many features and they love it. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: JC41923

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality night Vision, speaker, bad at signal transfer (WiFi connection)
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stream smoothly, needs reboots constantly, I have great WiFi connection w every other appliance, but this camera. Night vision is very poor, I can’t see definition in the room. The speaker doesn’t pick up the voices, it’s just white noise. I expected a better product
customer_reviews.author: Gretta C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. Works perfect. Love that I can watch the baby in Ohio from my home in Indiana.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Night Vision. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this despite poor reviews as we have had no problems with our previous Motorola monitor. The night vision on this model does not work AT ALL. One of the offered solutions to night vision issues is to make the baby's room brighter/add light, which is laughable. Don't waste your money on this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie M

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. Pricy for what it is, dosnt swivel and picture not very clear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller was super great to work with
customer_reviews.text: Returned, made noise at odd times and other issues. Seller was super great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Trent S.

customer_reviews.title: the range was very bad, the camera had a delay could not here ...
customer_reviews.text: the range was very bad , the camera had a delay could not here my children when they cried, the screen always made a split screen of the same camera . i hade a motorala mbp36s i was great good range good pics . this new one was a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this was the best.
customer_reviews.text: We use the monitor at home and use the hubble app at work to watch the baby. We tried a few other monitors, but for what is available now, this was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Akkob

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for about 5 months now. We both love it! The Hubble app is especially nice. We bought the essential package and are very happy
customer_reviews.author: nicole rae brady

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk! Would not connect to the monitor, this is the 2nd one we purchased the 1st one lasted 3 weeks past the warranty so we purchased this one as a replacement, and rite out of the box it's defective. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Charging Problem
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product when I was pregnant and only started using when my baby started sleeping on his room. When I conect the charge, ir is not working. I do have to try many times to find a way to make it working. I don’t knkw whom I have to talk. Terrza Aguiar
customer_reviews.author: Tereza Cristina Moraes de Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: camera wont connect to app
customer_reviews.text: The camera won't pair to the app. It did and now it wont reconnect. We have tried everything hasent been a problem until we are going out of town and I want to be able to see her well we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Bad Imaging, Serious Lag Time
customer_reviews.text: Major lag in video and noise even when monitor was in close proximity to camera. We have the fastest WIFI offered and still major problems. Night vision is not very clear. Not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Allen

customer_reviews.title: all my time is wasted for nothing
customer_reviews.text: I had very hard time with this monitor. First time, the issue was the battery. I got it excahnged with the new one. Now, I can't even pair it with the camera. I have spent 2 hrs to make it work, all my time is wasted for nothing. I am gonna return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hassenle!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and son in law after the birth of my grandson. I'm in the US and had this drop shipped to England. No issues with shipping. They are very happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: John Bresnai

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Got excited when seeing this and thought it's Motorola it can't suck. Well it sucked, picture quality is like a potato, and night vision?! Well you might as well sleep with the lights on. Definitely wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Casey monarez

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!! AVOID!!
customer_reviews.text: CAUGHT ON FIRE! Do NOT buy this! Amazon also refused a refund!! Fortunately I smelt it burning and noticed it was hot to the touch once I plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: LeClairMotorSports

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor literally stopped working on April 4th and my return window closed April 3rd. It won’t turn on, won’t charge, it’s dead. DO NOT buy this monitor. I saw it had mixed reviews but was still optimistic. I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Gray

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: didnt work so cant really review howevee customer service was great with return
customer_reviews.author: kaytlinn

customer_reviews.title: 10 months later...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked great at first but now after 10 months, we can’t charge it, the sounds doesn’t work and the battery life sucks. I’ve already complained to Motorola about it and haven’t heard anything back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent connection and noiseless.
customer_reviews.text: Wi-Fi is really useful, also it is easy to setup and use even when the cell out of Wi-Fi range (4g). Motion detection works well. There is no noise at all.
customer_reviews.author: FELIPE MAIA ARANTES

customer_reviews.title: Volume unacceptably low
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is good enough, but the volume is so low even when turned all the way up that by the time I could hear my son through the monitor, he was wailing loud enough that I could hear him through the wall, which defeats the purpose of a monitor. 😢 Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The monitor works great. The wifi is awful I can never get ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works great. The wifi is awful I can never get it to pull up on my phone using the app other than for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: 1 Camera won't stay connected. Would be great if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney 082689

customer_reviews.title: Charging cord doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The charging cord only worked when I positioned it a certain way - I requested a new cord, and finally received one - but unfortunately this one stopped working as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and setup. I love that it can connect to my phone and I can see my baby when I am not home.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: 2nd replacement and it’s not working again
customer_reviews.text: This is the second replacement we’ve had for this monitor. The handheld screen randomly shuts off and this time it won’t turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Luellen

customer_reviews.title: I love this easy to use monitor with night vision
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works well and has a large screen which also has an app for my iPhone. This grandma loves it
customer_reviews.author: merfy

customer_reviews.title: The app that comes with it is great!! You can see everything on your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: The app that comes with it is great!! You can see everything on your phone and get movement notifications as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Please answer
customer_reviews.text: How long is the guarantee on the Motorola baby monitor it burned out in less than a year
customer_reviews.author: paul dolinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome baby monitor! - Good connection: I'm able to get pretty good connection throughout the house - Easy setup: pretty much a plug in and play monitor - Good quality video and sound
customer_reviews.author: Cnq C.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, easy to use and set up. The app makes it super convenient to check in on things if the monitor is dead or out of reach. My only complaint is the sound. I don’t feel like it picks up noises quite as well as I would like. Got the two cameras so we would have one for each of our daughters’ rooms and have been using them for a couple of months now.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We felt the volume was low, and my husband could not make it work with his Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We only have problem with this product and don't have Warranty in Brazil
customer_reviews.text: We only had problems, Motorola Brasil has no ability to indicate or direct its client. We stayed in the hand, be careful!
customer_reviews.author: marcelo alonso

customer_reviews.title: Baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son and Daughter nLaw ,they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: make sound from the camera !
customer_reviews.text: make all the time sound from the camera, and becuse of this Reason the baby wake up.!!
customer_reviews.author: boaz156

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: very short range, only picks up loud sounds, my daughter is on a feeding pump and when it beeps it does not pick up the sound. if she is stress and I'm not looking at her I would never know. very disappointed in this product. a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: That's a dissapointing product, expensive and poor quality of image, signal and battery. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mircea VLAH

customer_reviews.title: Used, listed as new, creepy.
customer_reviews.text: Listed as brand new. Obviously used based on the photos. Kind of creepy. Does someone have access to view my kid now?
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Volume can’t hear baby
customer_reviews.text: No volume!!! Have replaced it once and new one is still having no volume can not hear baby
customer_reviews.author: Zack Dinsdale

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t connect - purchased 2!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second monitor of this model we purchased, both did not connect properly. Ended up going with smart nursery 7 baby monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Papacena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera was defective and customer had to contact Motorola for obtain new one.
customer_reviews.author: pat stigliani

product_meta.title: Motorola MBP845CONNECT 5" Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi Viewing, Digital Zoom, Two-Way Audio, and Room Temperature Display
product_meta.description: Style:5" Screen - 1 CameraKeep an eye on your little one from anywhere with this Motorola 5" Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi. Monitor while at home on the ergonomic parent unit with large 5" diagonal color screen, and check in when you’re away on a compatible smartphone, tablet, or computer. Receive sound, motion, and temperature notifications to your compatible viewing device with the Hubble app, ensuring that you're always connected to what’s going on at home. Clearly communicate with your partner or child from another room with the two-way communication feature, and get the perfect view day or night with infrared night vision. Motorola 5" Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi. Watch them dream. From anywhere.
feature_bullets: Wireless Technology: 2.4 GHz FHSS (for Local Viewing) Wireless Connectivity (for Remote Viewing) - Requires wireless connection to the internet and acompatible viewing device.
5-Inch Diagonal Color Screen with Digital Zoom, Two-Way Communication, Room Temperature Display, Infrared Night Vision, and High Sensitivity Microphone
Ergonomic Parent Unit, up to 1000ft Range with Out-of-Range and Low Battery Alerts and frequency range 2.4GHz to 2.48 GHz
Additional Features with Hubble Connected - View on Compatible Smartphones, Tablets, and Computers. Sound, Motion, and Temperature Notifications.
Motorola is America's #1 baby monitor brand in America (2017 revenue data).
Pairing can be affected by other devices in range, the device being used as well as any obstructions in the range of communication

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars342 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
